Title: Silverlight Window
Description: Silverlight Window helps you to simulate the WPF Window behavior in  Microsoft Windows Explorer. It supports Drag&Drop, Resize, Maximize&Minimize and some other features. And you can design WallPaper, StartMenu, TaskBar, TrayArea for the "Explorer".
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight Window helps you to simulate the WPF Window behavior in Microsoft Windows Explorer. It supports Drag&Drop, Resize, Maximize&Minimize and some other features. And you can design WallPaper, StartMenu, TaskBar, TrayArea for the "Explorer".


This project can help silverlight developers to implement WPF window features, there is an "Explorer" to manage all forms.

The explorer supports:
- Wallpaper
- Desktop Shortcut
- Taskbar


The form supports:
- Title
- Icon
- TrayArea Icon
- Drag&Drop
- Resize
- Maximise&Revert&Minimize
- Some other features of WPF Window class
